data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Babaeian, Esmaeil, Mašán, Peter, Saboori, Alireza (2016): The genus Pachyseius Berlese, 1910 in Iran (Acari: Pachylaelapidae). Zootaxa 4088 (3): 420-428, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4088.3.7
